title: Distribution of consumer transactions worldwide 2018 , by payment channel
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 11 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 41.0 is found at Response In-store and the minimum is found at Smart home device where Response is 2.0.
The highest Response In-store has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Smart home device.
min_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 41.0 is found at Response In-store and the minimum is found at Smart home device where Response is 2.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 11 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 41.0 is found at Response In-store and the minimum is found at Smart home device where Response is 2.0.
The highest Response In-store has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Smart home device.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 11 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 41.0 is found at Response In-store and the minimum is found at Smart home device where Response is 2.0.
The highest Response In-store has 39.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Smart home device.
Share of respondents at Response In-store is 41.0 , second place is Other online at 14.0, and thirdly is Buy buttons at 9.0.
Response Smart home device, Wearables / contactless, and Other share the same value 2.0.
The lowest value 2.0 at Smart home device is almost 4.47 times smaller than the average value 9.18.
